channel.title: Please check on this.[DELTA]
channel.description:
OK i have two things that MUST be done and i cannot figure out to release my server... please someone try to be helpful as i am an active member.
#1- thread per client= removing multi login. i believe i have it but every time i set it to 1 connection per IP it still lets people connect? if requested i can send you the code i have.i would LOVE some help on this lol i have tried a lot of times and even got someone else to try and no luck so far :P
#2- giving portals options!!!- has been puzzling me for about 3 days now lol. haven't found a single tutorial or any help from any one on this yet :\ i want it to when a play click on portal.. it doesn't tele him right away.. it gives you dialogue in you're chatbox with options for example: "kbd" "mith drags" etc..
please i need some help on these. greatly appreciated.
thank you.

item.title: Please check on this.[DELTA]
item.dc:creator: @mochronik mochronik
item.description:
@mochronik wrote:

thats actually not a bad idea very creative and can do in less than 10 minutes XD but i REALLY want options

Read full topic
